item.title: Moderna L-shaped desk
item.description: The Moderna L-shaped desk is perfect for your home office. Crafted from Sindoori Mango with white accents, its powder coated metal frame ensures long-lasting durability and beautiful style even in the busiest of workspaces. Enjoy plenty of work area with the spacious desk top and keep your documents organized in the lower drawer featuring full extension slides. Complete with a 360 degree all round finish, the Moderna L-shaped desk offers flexibility and versatility to suit any room. Home office desk in Sindoori Mango with white accents Powder coated metal frame for durability Spacious work area Lower drawer with full extension slides holds letter-size hanging files 360 degree all round finish (can be freestanding)

item.title: Manhattan view L-shaped desk
item.description: This custom-crafted Manhattan View L-shaped Desk is designed to bring an air of sophistication to any home office. Its robust metal frame is finished in a sleek brown-powder coat for long-lasting durability. The generous working area provides plenty of space for multi-tasking and productivity, while the elevated shelf, cubbyhole storage, open storage with a fixed shelf, and concealed storage with a flip-down panel offer designated spots for organizational needs. Enhanced with cable management for efficient wiring, this ultra-modern desk complements the Mystic Oak finish to create an unmistakable look of luxury. Home office L-shaped desk in Mystic Oak finish Brown powder coated metal frame for durability Large desk and return provide a generous working area Drawer features metal runners and safety stops Elevated shelf with cubbyhole storage Open storage with fixed shelf Concealed storage with flip-down panel Cable management

item.title: Mediterranean shaker style desk
item.description: The ultimate in sophistication and style, this Mediterranean shaker style desk is crafted for luxury. With a Soft White finish and Lintel Oak accents, it will command attention in any room. Decorative tile pattern on the drawer fronts, a generous working area, a filing drawer for letter size hanging files, and two lower shelves for additional storage make this the desk of dreams. The 360 degree all-round finish and patented T-lock assembly system make it a stylish and practical choice. Mediterranean shaker style desk in Soft White finish with Lintel Oak accent Unique, eye-catching design Decorative tile pattern on drawer fronts Generous working area Filing drawer for letter size hanging files Drawers feature patented T-lock assembly system Two lower shelves for additional storage 360 degree all round finish

item.title: Hythe wall mounted desk
item.description: The Hythe Wall Mounted Desk is the perfect addition to bring a sense of luxury and sophistication to any space. Its stylish Serene Walnut finish gives your area a dose of elegant style, and its space-saving design is ideal for any modern home. Two open shelves offer decorative display or functional storage options, and a hidden compartment behind the sliding door gives you a secure place for your important items. Its power-coated metal frame ensures lasting durability. item.title: Canyon lane desk
item.description: Grace your home office with the timeless beauty of the Canyon Lane Desk. Expertly handcrafted with a Brew Oak finish and highlighted by Grand Walnut accents, the desk adds a subtle sophistication to any space. Beneath its sturdy top, cubbyhole storage and an adjustable shelf behind the door provide versatile storage solutions. Finished with a 360 degree all round design, the desk can stand confidently in any room as a stunning centrepiece. item.title: Summit Desk
item.description: Summit Desk is a modern, luxury home office desk with sophisticated design and exquisite attention to detail. Crafted with a Laurel Oak finish, this sleek and simple piece features spacious work area, two drawers with metal runners and safety stops, plus a filing drawer to store letter-sized hanging files. An all round finish and tapered leg detail make this desk perfect for any space, while a discreet cable port offers convenient cable management. Add a lower storage shelf for extra storage. Make this premium piece the centrepiece of your home office. Home office desk in Laurel Oak finish Sleek, simple design Spacious work area Two drawers with metal runners and safety stops Filing drawer for letter sized hanging files 360 degree all round finish, (can be freestanding) Tapered leg detail Cable port for discreet cable management Lower storage shelf

item.title: Vertex Sit Stand Desk Bourbon Oak
item.description: The Vertex Sit Stand Desk is the perfect addition to a sophisticated home office. The Bourbon Oak finish with soft black accents provides a stylish and elegant touch to any workspace. Its patent-pending pneumatic mechanism allows for effortless and infinite height adjustment from 74.9cm to 109.9cm to accommodate your exact needs. Plus, the heat, stain and scratch-resistant melamine top, cord management and adjustable levellers provide practicality and convenience while the 360°all round finish makes it perfect for freestanding use. Home office sit/stand desk in Bourbon Oak with soft black accents Patent-pending pneumatic mechanism provides effortless and infinite adjustment from 74.9cm – 109.9cm Heat, stain and scratch-resistant melamine top Cord management 360°all round finish, (can be freestanding) Adjustable levellers to accommodate uneven floor surfaces

item.title: Sit stand desk salt oak
item.description: Get productive and ergonomic in style with this Sit Stand Desk in Salt Oak. Easily switch between standing and sitting at work by lifting the left side of the desktop up and forward to your desired position. Running low on storage? With two filing drawers, storage drawer, open shelf, and hidden storage area beneath the top, you'll have space for everything. Quick and easy assembly with the patented T-lock drawer system so you can be productive in no time! Ergonomic sit/stand desk in Salt Oak finish Left side of desktop lifts up and forward to create a versatile option to work sitting or standing Hidden storage area beneath top Lower filing drawers with full extension slides for letter-sized hanging files Storage/stationery drawer Open shelf for additional storage Quick and easy assembly with patented T-lock drawer system 360 degree all round finish (can be freestanding)

And don't worry about cables; a cable management system keeps everything neat and organized. Make work and home life easier with this beautiful desk.
